documentation.text:
The thirdweb `Pack` contract is a lootbox mechanism. An account can bundle up arbitrary ERC20, ERC721 and ERC1155 tokens into
  a set of packs. A pack can then be opened in return for a selection of the tokens in the pack. The selection of tokens distributed
  on opening a pack depends on the relative supply of all tokens in the packs.
@notice Emitted when a set of packs is created.
@notice Emitted when more packs are minted for a packId.
@notice Emitted when a pack is opened.

params.amountDistributedPerOpen: The number of reward units distributed per open.
params.contents: The reward units to pack in the packs.
params.numOfRewardUnits: The number of reward units to create, for each asset specified in `contents`.
params.openStartTimestamp: The timestamp after which packs can be opened.
params.packUri: The (metadata) URI assigned to the packs created.
params.recipient: The recipient of the packs created.

returns.packId: The unique identifer of the created set of packs.
returns.packTotalSupply: The total number of packs created.

params.amountToOpen: The number of packs to open at once.
params.packId: The identifier of the pack to open.

PackCreated(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a set of packs is created.

PackOpened(uint256,address,uint256,(addr.notice: Emitted when a pack is opened.

PackUpdated(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when more packs are minted for a packId.

createPack((address,uint8,uint256,uint25.notice: Creates a pack with the stated contents.

openPack(uint256,uint256).notice: Lets a pack owner open a pack and receive the pack's reward unit.

userdoc.notice: The thirdweb `Pack` contract is a lootbox mechanism. An account can bundle up arbitrary ERC20, ERC721 and ERC1155 tokens into  a set of packs. A pack can then be opened in return for a selection of the tokens in the pack. The selection of tokens distributed  on opening a pack depends on the relative supply of all tokens in the packs.
